title: Commission Regulation (EC) No 5/2002 of 3 January 2002 amending the rates of the refunds applicable to certain products from the sugar sector exported in the form of goods not covered by Annex I to the Treaty
header:
Commission Regulation (EC) No 5/2002
of 3 January 2002
amending the rates of the refunds applicable to certain products from the sugar sector exported in the form of goods not covered by Annex I to the Treaty
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
recitals:
,
Having regard to the Treaty establishing the European Community,
Having regard to Council Regulation (EC) No 1260/2001 of 19 June 2001 on the common organisation of the markets in the sugar sector(1), and in particular Article 27(5)(a) and (15) thereof,
Whereas:
(1) The rates of the refunds applicable from 1 January 2002 to the products listed in the Annex, exported in the form of goods not covered by Annex I to the Treaty, were fixed by Commission Regulation (EC) No 2578/2001(2).
(2) It follows from applying the rules and criteria contained in Regulation (EC) No 2578/2001 to the information at present available to the Commission that the export refunds at present applicable should be altered as shown in the Annex hereto,
main_body: The rates of refund fixed by Regulation (EC) No 2578/2001 are hereby altered as shown in the Annex hereto.

This Regulation shall enter into force on 4 January 2002.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 3 January 2002.
For the Commission
Erkki Liikanen
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ L 178, 30.6.2001, p. 1.
(2) OJ L 344, 28.12.2001, p. 66.
ANNEX
to the Commission Regulation of 3 January 2002 fixing the rates of the refunds applicable to certain products in the sugar sector exported in the form of goods not covered by Annex I to the Treaty
